welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Hyattsville, where charm and history come together to create a unique experience. From our vibrant arts scene to our delicious cuisine, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Potomac Airfield Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Potomac Airfield Airport provides exclusive services for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Montgomery County Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Montgomery County Airport caters to private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights and is divided into five concourses.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: This concourse serves Southwest Airlines flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: This concourse serves American Airlines and Delta Air Lines flights.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: This concourse serves United Airlines and Spirit Airlines flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Washington Dulles International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Washington Dulles International Airport serves mainly international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Washington Dulles International Airport serves mainly domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.
